p: The ideal candidate's favorite words are learning, data, scale, and agility. You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answers.
p.3: =E2=80=A2 Excellent analytical, statistical, and problem-solving skills.
p.4: =E2=80=A2 Highly proficient in Python, SQL, shell scripting, Git.
p.5: =E2=80=A2 Substantive experience working with peta-scale data in a cloud environment (GCP, AWS, Azure).
p.6: =E2=80=A2 Thorough understanding of machine learning engineering principles such as distributed/parallel computing paradigms and advanced data structures.
p.7: =E2=80=A2 Familiarity with modern libraries for scaling up workloads such as Dask, PyArrow, and Rapids.
p.8: =E2=80=A2 Expertise with one or many ML/DL libraries such as Scikit-learn, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.
p.9: =E2=80=A2 Experience developing lightweight reporting dashboards (Voila, Dash, Panel, Streamlit).
p.10: =E2=80=A2 Strong collaboration and communication skills within and across teams.
p.11: =E2=80=A2 Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Physics, or related discipline.
p.14: =E2=80=A2 Strong problem solving skills and critical thinking ability.
p.15: =E2=80=A2 Strong collaboration and communication skills within and across teams.
p.16: =E2=80=A2 Specialization in reinforcement learning, Bayesian modeling, time series analysis, survival analysis, geospatial analysis, or NLP.
p.18: =E2=80=A2 Interested in mentoring junior team members.
p.19: =E2=80=A2 Strong organizational, management, and leadership skills.
p.20: =E2=80=A2 Ability to communicate technical ideas and results to non-technical clients in written and verbal form.
p.21: =E2=80=A2 Master=E2=80=99s degree or PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Physics, or related discipline

li: Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science, Engineering, Machine Learning, or related discipline.
